ygData.subject: RE: Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Daks, Thanks for the reply. Im sorry to hear that the list is really slow, but Im not surprised.  With so many people, like yourself, achieving the upper
ygData.messageBody:
Daks,

Thanks for the reply. Im sorry to hear that the list is really slow, but Im
not surprised. With so many people, like yourself, achieving the upper
levels information is abundant in-game. I guess what Im most interested in
is hearing from people like yourself who might have a story, a suggestion, a
pitfall to avoid, a strategy, a nice area to hunt, etc etc. As a 47th
Warrior I imagine you have seen just about all there is to see and do across
Norrath. Id love to share your adventures, what suggestions you might have
for those higher level hunts and adventures.

Thanks again for the reply,

Thoren & Co.
The Norrath Adventuring Co.
Rathe
